subject: Re: [junit] Testing with Junit
msgSnippet: ... Here are a couple starting points... JUnit Cookbook: http://www.junit.org/junit/doc/cookbook/cookbook.htm JUnit Primer:
messageBody:
--- Ram Kumar <ramjunit@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I am assigned to test a Java application using Junit. I am new to
> Junit
> testing.
>
> Any body can help me in suggesting what steps to be followed to test
> the
> application? Do I need any IDE tool to test the application?
>

Here are a couple starting points...

JUnit Cookbook:
http://www.junit.org/junit/doc/cookbook/cookbook.htm

JUnit Primer:
http://www.clarkware.com/articles/JUnitPrimer.html

Mike
